title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Enhancing Organizational Effectiveness Through Reflective Inquiry and Action Learning

context.prior_knowledge: At least five years of professional experience and foundational leadership competencies
context.additional_context: Establishes a smartphone-based real-time collaborative learning environment for science sector managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze workplace problems using a reflective inquiry framework.
Learners execute a collaborative problem-solving process in action learning groups with over 80% participation.
Learners develop three or more reflective practice cases transitioning from single-loop to double-loop learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
